[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:20, topic:220360”][quote author=supamagier link=topic=289387.msg2340259#msg2340259 date=1216302780]

it’s easy to trace IP addresses silly.
unless it’s a fake IP or something, you need to get a little more in-depth with it.

“Trace”… what exactly do you mean by that? I assumed he meant “obtaining a location, or any other reallife info, from an IP”… in which case, anyone who says they can do that is a liar or works for every single major ISP.

oh rly?

Works for me.
[/quote]
I tried that and it said I lived in America.[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

My IP address location & My IP address info: My IP address [?]: 211.29.165.153 Copy [Whois] My IP address country: Australia My IP address state: New South Wales My IP address city: Springwood My IP address latitude: -33.7000 My IP address longitude: 150.5500 My ISP [?]: OPTUS INTERNET - RETAIL My Proxy: None / Highly Anonymous [Proxychecker] Organization: OPTUS INTERNET - RETAIL Host of my IP: [?]: d211-29-165-153.dsl.nsw.optusnet.com.au [Whois] Local Time of this IP country: 2008-07-17 21:18

More about my IP and my system:
My Speed: Cable/DSL [Speedtest]
My Browser [?]: Mozilla Firefox 2.0
My Operating System [?]: Linux
Referer: http://moparisthebest.com
Lookup moparisthebest.com


After re-trying it, it got it pretty spot on, except for this part:
My IP address city: Springwood

item.title: Hack
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“supamagier, post:19, topic:220360”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=289387.msg2336923#msg2336923 date=1216151134]

it’s easy to trace IP addresses silly.
unless it’s a fake IP or something, you need to get a little more in-depth with it.

“Trace”… what exactly do you mean by that? I assumed he meant “obtaining a location, or any other reallife info, from an IP”… in which case, anyone who says they can do that is a liar or works for every single major ISP.
[/quote]
oh rly?

Works for me.[/quote]

One time I used one of those and it got my exact post code, but as Mopman said in this topic, it’s very rare for them to be correct, and all the recent ones I’ve tried have said I live in Exeter when I’m at least 2 hours away from Exeter.

Read full topic

item.title: Hack
item.dc:creator: @army_life army_life
item.description:
@army_life wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:8, topic:220360”][quote author=army_life link=topic=289387.msg2336481#msg2336481 date=1216123432]
Because its so hard to trace an IP.
[/quote]

army_life you are a moron.

rabcarl - mitb isn’t your personal army.

it’s easy to trace IP addresses silly.
unless it’s a fake IP or something, you need to get a little more in-depth with it.

anyways, OP, don’t ask for people to ‘hack’ someone for you. for all we know, you’re just some little kid pissed off at some other guy for bothering you on msn or he called you a fag.

plus, nobody wants to ‘hack’ someone for you anyways.
learn to do it yourself.

You could trace the IP to country, maybe even general area, but that’s about it. Even then, last time I traced my own IP it said I lived in California…[/quote]

Your a moron I was saying it sarcastically plus if you use the cheap free ones there not good but you can pay for them and can find out a lot of information.

Read full topic

anyways, OP, don’t ask for people to ‘hack’ someone for you. for all we know, you’re just some little kid pissed off at some other guy for bothering you on msn or he called you a fag.

learn to do it yourself.[/quote]
